backend.description: The remote backend to use, e.g. `remote` or `http`.

config.description:
The configuration of the remote backend. Although this is optional, most backends require some configuration.

The object can use any arguments that would be valid in the equivalent `terraform { backend "<TYPE>" { ... } }` block.

defaults.description: Default values for outputs, in case the state file is empty or lacks a required output.

outputs.description: An object containing every root-level output in the remote state.

workspace.description: The Terraform workspace to use, if the backend supports workspaces.
